title: Dark Chocolate Wrapped Salted Caramel & Pecan Pie Bars
directions: Line an 8x8 baking dish with parchment paper.
Place all crust ingredients into your food processor and pulse until finely chopped/dough-like.
Press crust into the bottom of your baking dish.
Place all pecan pie ingredients into your food processor and blend until completely smooth stopping to scrape down the sides.
Place all salted caramel ingredients into your food processor and blend until completely smooth.
Using a spoon swirl caramel into your pecan pie mixture.
Spread combined mixture over your blondie brownie crust.
Cover and place in the freezer for 4 hours (to overnight).
Remove from freezer, cut into bars and place on a cooling rack to coat with your chocolate.
You can drizzle with chocolate or completely coat your bars.
Serve immediately or place back in the freezer in a sealed tight container to enjoy later.
ingredients: 1 Cup Super Soft Pitted Medjool Dates
1 Cup Super Soft Pitted Medjool Dates
2 Tbsp Maple Syrup (I do not find this necessary but if you have a super sweet tooth you may)
1/2 Cup Super Soft Pitted Medjool Dates
Melted Vegan Dark Chocolate Chips or our Chocolate Candy Coating Recipe found here.
